**GENERAL DESCRIPTION**
=======================

| turtle_comments.py provides the user with several functions that draw different types of figures:

* a square
* several squares
* concentric squares
* a n-gon
* a spiral

.. image:: _static/logo.png
   :height: 100px
   :width: 200 px
   :scale: 50 %
   :alt: alternate text
   :align: right
